entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon with 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023
